context:
Implement configuration file support using TOML format.

What it does:
- Load config from ~/.config/dex/dex.toml
- Parse storage engine settings
- Provide defaults if config doesn't exist

Implementation:
- Add dependency: '@iarna/toml' or 'smol-toml' (research which is better)
- Create src/core/config.ts with:
  - loadConfig(): Config function
  - Config type with storage settings
  - Path: ~/.config/dex/dex.toml
- Config structure:
  [storage]
  engine = "file"
  [storage.file]
  path = "~/.dex"
- Handle missing config gracefully (use defaults)

Done when:
- TOML parser dependency added
- Config loading function exists
- Returns config object or defaults
- Config file path is ~/.config/dex/dex.toml
- Unit tests for config loading
result:
Added TOML config file loading:

Implementation:
- Installed smol-toml (faster, TOML 1.1.0 compliant, actively maintained)
- Created src/core/config.ts with Config types and loading
- Config path: ~/.config/dex/dex.toml (respects XDG_CONFIG_HOME)
- Supports all three storage engines: file, github-issues, github-projects
- Handles missing config gracefully (returns defaults)
- Handles malformed TOML gracefully (warns and returns defaults)

Testing:

- Tests config path resolution, XDG_CONFIG_HOME support
- Tests all storage engine configurations
